properties.name: aggo.orm.port
properties.description: Database server port. Defaults based on dialect (5432 for PostgreSQL, 3306 for MySQL).

properties.name: aggo.orm.dialect
properties.description: SQL dialect - determines database type and default port.

properties.name: aggo.orm.migrations.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable automatic migrations on startup.

properties.name: aggo.orm.migrations.base-package
properties.description: Base package to scan for migration classes.

properties.name: aggo.orm.migrations.show-details
properties.description: Whether to show detailed migration execution logs.

properties.name: aggo.orm.migrations.fail-on-error
properties.description: Whether to stop application startup if a migration fails.

properties.name: aggo.orm.migrations.validate-checksums
properties.description: Whether to validate checksums of already applied migrations.
